  ::  allocated 4-byte codec 
  ::  allocated 4-byte codec 
 ERR  Cannot store all Huffman codewords in 32-bit representation
 ERR  Huffman codeword representation requires at least 33 bits (longest codeword: 25 bits)
  !!  switch to fallback codec 
  !!  online allocate fallback (8-byte) codec

  !!  switch to fallback codec
